subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Dainius Zubrus scored on a rebound with 4:04 to play and the Devils beat the Philadelphia Flyers to even the first-round Eastern Conference playoff series at a game apiece.
snippet: Dainius Zubrus scored on a rebound with 4:04 to play and the Devils beat the Philadelphia Flyers to even the first-round Eastern Conference playoff series at a game apiece.
